ingredients.item: 100g pack flat leaf parsley, leaves chopped
2 lemons, juice of 1½, ½ cut into wedges

instructions.step: Bring a pan of salted water to the boil, then add the bulgur wheat and simmer for 15 minutes until tender. Drain and rinse the bulgur under cold water, then tip into a large bowl.

Meanwhile, coat the chicken in the shawarma paste and ½ tbsp oil. Heat a griddle pan over a medium heat and cook the chicken for 7-8 minutes on each side, until cooked through, the juices run clear and there is no pink meat.

Add the onion, tomatoes, parsley and chopped mint to the bulgur. Toss with the lemon juice and remaining 1 tbsp oil; season. Divide between 4 plates, add the chicken, a dollop of yogurt and the reserved mint. Serve with the lemon wedges.
